name: code-block
title: Code Block
description: Provides syntax highlighting, line numbers, and copy to clipboard functionality for code blocks.

files.content: {@render children?.()}
{#if child && selectedBlock} {@render child(selectedBlock)} {:else} {@render children?.()} {/if}

{#if syntaxHighlighting && shikiHtml}
{@html shikiHtml}
{:else} {/if}

<script lang="ts">
    import { Button } from "$lib/components/ui/button";
    import { cn } from "$UTILS$.js";
    import type { ComponentProps } from "svelte";
    import { getContext } from "./code-block-context.svelte";
    import { CheckIcon, CopyIcon } from "@lucide/svelte";

    let {
        ref = $bindable(null),
        onCopy,
        onError,
        timeout = 2000,
        class: className,
        children,
        ...restProps
    }: ComponentProps<typeof Button> & {
        onCopy?: () => void;
        onError?: (error: Error) => void;
        timeout?: number;
    } = $props();

    const ctx = getContext();

    let isCopied = $state(false);
    const code = $derived(ctx.data.find((item) => item.language === ctx.value)?.code);

    const copyToClipboard = () => {
        if (
            typeof window === "undefined" ||
            !navigator.clipboard.writeText ||
            !code
        ) {
            return;
        }

        navigator.clipboard.writeText(code).then(() => {
            isCopied = true;
            onCopy?.();

            setTimeout(() => isCopied = false, timeout);
        }, onError);
    };

    const Icon = $derived(isCopied ? CheckIcon : CopyIcon);
</script>

<Button
    class={cn("shrink-0", className)}
    onclick={copyToClipboard}
    size="icon"
    variant="ghost"
    {...restProps}
>
    {#if children}
        {@render children()}
    {:else}
        <Icon className="text-muted-foreground" size={14} />
    {/if}
</Button>

{#if lines}
                {#each lines as line, i(i)}
                    
                        {line}
                    
                {/each}
            {/if}

{#if value === ctx.value}
{@render children?.()}
{/if}
{#if child && selectedBlock} {@render child(selectedBlock)} {:else} {@render children?.()} {/if}
{@render children?.()}

{#if value === ctx.value}
{@render children?.()}
{/if}

<script lang="ts">
    import { Select } from "$lib/components/ui/select";
    import type { ComponentProps } from "svelte";
    import { getContext } from "./code-block-context.svelte";

    let {
        ...restProps
    }: Omit<ComponentProps<typeof Select>, "type" | "onValueChange" | "value"> = $props();

    const ctx = getContext();
</script>

<Select
    type="single"
    onValueChange={(v) => ctx.onValueChange?.(v)} 
    bind:value={ctx.value} 
    {...restProps} 
/>

<script lang="ts">
    import { SelectContent } from "$lib/components/ui/select";
    import type { ComponentProps, Snippet } from "svelte";
    import type { CodeBlockData } from "./types";
    import { getContext } from "./code-block-context.svelte";

    let {
        class: className,
        child,
        children,
        ...restProps
    }: ComponentProps<typeof SelectContent> & {
        child: Snippet<[CodeBlockData[]]>
    } = $props();

    const ctx = getContext();
</script>

<SelectContent
    class={className}
    {...restProps}
>
    {#if child}
        {@render child(ctx.data)}
    {:else}
        {@render children?.()}
    {/if}
</SelectContent>

<script lang="ts">
    import { SelectItem } from "$lib/components/ui/select";
    import { cn } from "$UTILS$.js";
    import type { ComponentProps } from "svelte";

    let {
        class: className,
        ...restProps
    }: ComponentProps<typeof SelectItem> = $props();
</script>

<SelectItem class={cn("text-sm", className)} {...restProps} />

<script lang="ts">
    import { SelectTrigger } from "$lib/components/ui/select";
    import { cn } from "$UTILS$.js";
    import type { ComponentProps } from "svelte";

    let {
        class: className,
        ...restProps
    }: ComponentProps<typeof SelectTrigger> = $props();
</script>

<SelectTrigger
    class={cn(
        "w-fit border-none text-muted-foreground text-xs shadow-none",
        className
    )}
    {...restProps}
/>
{ctx.value}
